categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The crown prince of Thisspias was a Thisspiasian male who was a part of the monarchy of the planet Thisspias during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The crown prince was imprisoned by the Imperial governor of Thisspias, although he was eventually liberated by the Rebel Alliance and, following the Battle of Endor, claimed the title of Blood Monarch as a result of a civil war on Thisspias.
